Zoom settings

Source: R/girafe_options.R
opts_zoom.Rd

Allows customization of the zoom.

opts_zoom(min = 1, max = 1)

Arguments

min

minimum zoom factor
max

maximum zoom factor

See also

Other girafe animation options: girafe_options(), opts_hover(), opts_selection(), opts_sizing(), opts_toolbar(), opts_tooltip()

Examples

library(ggplot2)

dataset <- mtcars
dataset$carname = row.names(mtcars)

gg <- ggplot(
  data = dataset,
  mapping = aes(x = wt, y = qsec, color = disp,
                tooltip = carname, data_id = carname) ) +
  geom_point_interactive() + theme_minimal()

x <- girafe(ggobj = gg)
x <- girafe_options(x,
  opts_zoom(min = .7, max = 2) )
if( interactive() ) print(x)
